publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2971 Stuart McMillan: Right of Suffrage—That the Parliament notes with concern the recent reports about convicted prisoners having the right to vote and agrees that with rights come responsibilities but considers that when a person is convicted some rights should be removed, including the right of suffrage.
